name: addon-example-buffer-zig
description: Example of addon using Zig. How to access Buffers in Zig

scripts.bdev: mkdir -p dist && ZIG_SYSTEM_LINKER_HACK=1 zig build-lib -mcpu=baseline -ODebug -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/lib.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/lib.node
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && ZIG_SYSTEM_LINKER_HACK=1 zig build-lib -mcpu=baseline -OReleaseSafe -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/lib.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/lib.node
